mapper.select: SELECT c.campRateNo, c.contentId, c.campRateCleanliness, c.campRatePrice, c.campRateFacility, c.userNo, c.campRateContent, c.campRateCreateTime, c.campRateUpdateTime, c.campRateTitle, u.userNickname FROM campRate c, user u WHERE c.userNo = u.userNo AND contentId = #{contentId};

SELECT c.campRateNo, c.contentId, c.campRateCleanliness, c.campRatePrice, c.campRateFacility, c.userNo, c.campRateContent, c.campRateCreateTime, c.campRateUpdateTime, c.campRateTitle, u.userNickname FROM campRate c, user u WHERE c.userNo = u.userNo AND campRateNo = #{campRateNo};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO campRate(contentId, campRateCleanliness, campRatePrice, campRateFacility, userNo, campRateContent, campRateTitle) VALUES( #{contentId}, #{campRateCleanliness}, #{campRatePrice}, #{campRateFacility}, #{userNo}, #{campRateContent}, #{campRateTitle} );
